text.text: Cherry Picked Features for Marketing Automation

Mumara Campaigns is collection of core features to help you leverage data-driven email marketing .It is too flexible to operate, easy to automate, and detailed when it comes to its ability of reporting and performance analysis. Take a step forward, organize your email data, automate and turn ordinary email data into actionable workflow.

Show your customers that you are alive and you take care of them by keeping their information up-to-date. You can also automate this experience by integrating our API with your website or store for real-time synchronization without involving.
Boost up Sales by Sending Auto Follow-ups

Setup multiple groups of auto follow-up emails for multiple types of customers and let Mumara pitch your customers according to their taste. Follow-ups will be sent according to your set criteria and time laps with real-time reporting.

Mumara will automatically execute your chosen action upon occurring an event. An event is your defined criteria of anything being happened that Mumara can understand. Grow your financial figures and sales by putting your marketing on a complete automation.
